languages.text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Голос Вигдис, искаженный вокс-системой, звучит еще более механическим и отстранненым.{/n} "Леди-Навигатор... ожидает вас на мостике уже около часа. Понимаете, из-за ее присутсвия офицеры... Кхм. Кажется, Леди Кассия желает поговорить о чем-то очень важном. Ее волнение передается окружающим".

"Lord Captain..." {n}Vigdis's vox-distorted voice sounds even more mechanical and detached than normal.{/n} "The Lady Navigator... has been waiting for you on the bridge for half a watch cycle now. You see, because of her presence, the officers..." {n}She clears her throat.{/n} "I believe Lady Cassia wishes to speak about something very important. Her unease is spreading to those around her."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Голос Вигдис, искаженный вокс-системой, звучит еще более механическим и отстранненым.{/n} "Леди-Навигатор... ожидает вас на мостике уже около часа. Понимаете, из-за ее присутсвия офицеры... Кхм. Кажется, Леди Кассия желает поговорить о чем-то очень важном. Ее волнение передается окружающим".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Vigdis's vox-distorted voice sounds even more mechanical and detached than normal.{/n} "The Lady Navigator... has been waiting for you on the bridge for about an hour now. You see, because of her presence, the officers..." {n}She clears her throat.{/n} "I believe Lady Cassia wishes to speak about something very important. Her unease is spreading to those around her."

You see, because of her presence, the officers..." {n}She clears her throat.{/n} "I believe Lady Cassia wishes to speak about something very important. Her unease is spreading to those around her."

"Lord Captain..." {n}Vigdis's vox-distorted voice sounds even more mechanical and detached than normal.{/n} "The Lady Navigator... has been waiting for you on the bridge for half a watch cycle now. You see, because of her presence, the officers..." {n}She clears her throat.{/n} "I believe Lady Cassia wishes to speak about something very important. Her unease is spreading to those around her."

languages.text: “舰长大人……”{n}维格迪斯的声音透过音阵装置传来，听起来比平时更加僵硬，更加疏离。{/n}“导航者女士……已经在舰桥上等待您快半巡了。她站在那里，周围的军官都……”{n}她清了清嗓子。{/n}“我想，卡西娅女士一定有非常重要的事要告诉您，她的不安已经影响到她身边的其他人了。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Vigdis's vox-distorted voice sounds even more mechanical and detached than normal.{/n} "The Lady Navigator... has been waiting for you on the bridge for half a watch cycle now. You see, because of her presence, the officers..." {n}She clears her throat.{/n} "I believe Lady Cassia wishes to speak about something very important. Her unease is spreading to those around her."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人……”{n}维格迪斯的声音透过音阵装置传来，听起来比平时更加僵硬、更加疏离。{/n}“导航者女士……已经在舰桥上等待您快一个小时了。她站在那里，周围的军官都……”{n}她清了清嗓子。{/n}“我想，卡西娅女士一定有非常重要的事要告诉您，她的不安已经影响到她身边的其他人了。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain ..." {n}Vigdis' vox-verzerrte Stimme klingt noch mechanischer und distanzierter als üblich.{/n} "Die Lady Navigator ... wartet seit gut einem halben Wachzyklus auf der Brücke auf Euch. Ihre Anwesenheit ... nun ja ... die Offiziere ..." {n}Sie räuspert sich.{/n} "Mir scheint, Lady Cassia möchte mit Euch über etwas Wichtiges sprechen. Ihre Unruhe breitet sich auf andere aus."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Vigdis's vox-distorted voice sounds even more mechanical and detached than normal.{/n} "The Lady Navigator... has been waiting for you on the bridge for half a watch cycle now. You see, because of her presence, the officers..." {n}She clears her throat.{/n} "I believe Lady Cassia wishes to speak about something very important. Her unease is spreading to those around her."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain ..." {n}Vigdis' vox-verzerrte Stimme klingt noch mechanischer und distanzierter als üblich.{/n} "Die Lady Navigator ... wartet seit gut einer Stunde auf der Brücke auf Euch. Ihre Anwesenheit ... nun ja ... die Offiziere ..." {n}Sie räuspert sich.{/n} "Mir scheint, Lady Cassia möchte mit Euch über etwas Wichtiges sprechen. Ihre Unruhe breitet sich auf andere aus."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}résonne la voix déformée par le vox de Vigdis, encore plus mécanique et détachée qu'à l'accoutumée.{/n} « La navigatrice... vous attend sur la passerelle depuis un demi-cycle environ. Du fait de sa présence, les officiers... » {n}Elle se racle la gorge.{/n} « Je crois que dame Cassia a quelque chose de très important à vous dire. Sa gêne se propage à tous ceux qui l'entourent. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Vigdis's vox-distorted voice sounds even more mechanical and detached than normal.{/n} "The Lady Navigator... has been waiting for you on the bridge for half a watch cycle now. You see, because of her presence, the officers..." {n}She clears her throat.{/n} "I believe Lady Cassia wishes to speak about something very important. Her unease is spreading to those around her."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}résonne la voix déformée par le vox de Vigdis, encore plus mécanique et détachée qu'à l'accoutumée.{/n} « La navigatrice... vous attend sur la passerelle depuis une heure environ. Du fait de sa présence, les officiers... » {n}Elle se racle la gorge.{/n} « Je crois que dame Cassia a quelque chose de très important à vous dire. Sa gêne se propage à tous ceux qui l'entourent. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}La voz del voco distorsionado de Vigdis suena aún más mecánico y distante de lo normal.{/n} «La lady Navegante... {mf|le|la} lleva esperando en la puerta medio ciclo de guardia. Verá, debido a su presencia, los oficiales...». {n}Se aclara la garganta.{/n} «Creo que lady Cassia desea hablar de algo muy importante. Está contagiando su malestar a los que la rodean».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Vigdis's vox-distorted voice sounds even more mechanical and detached than normal.{/n} "The Lady Navigator... has been waiting for you on the bridge for half a watch cycle now. You see, because of her presence, the officers..." {n}She clears her throat.{/n} "I believe Lady Cassia wishes to speak about something very important. Her unease is spreading to those around her."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}La voz del voco distorsionado de Vigdis suena aún más mecánico y distante de lo normal.{/n} «La lady Navegante... {mf|le|la} lleva esperando en la puerta medio ciclo de guardia. Verá, debido a su presencia, los oficiales...». {n}Se aclara la garganta.{/n} «Creo que lady Cassia desea hablar de algo muy importante. Está contagiando su malestar a los que la rodean».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」 {n}ヴィグディスのヴォクスに歪まされた声は、通常と比べるとさらに機械的で、離れているように聞こえた。{/n}「レディ・ナヴィゲイターが…見張り半周分に匹敵する時間、艦橋であなたをお待ちです。それと、彼女の存在で、 士官たちが…」{n}彼女は咳払いをした。{/n}「レディ・カシアは、何か大切なことをお話ししたいのではないでしょうか。彼女の不安が周囲の人々に広がっています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Vigdis's vox-distorted voice sounds even more mechanical and detached than normal.{/n} "The Lady Navigator... has been waiting for you on the bridge for half a watch cycle now. You see, because of her presence, the officers..." {n}She clears her throat.{/n} "I believe Lady Cassia wishes to speak about something very important. Her unease is spreading to those around her."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」 {n}ヴィグディスのヴォクスに歪まされた声は、通常と比べるとさらに機械的で、離れているように聞こえた。{/n}「レディ・ナヴィゲイターが…見張り半周分に匹敵する時間、艦橋であなたをお待ちです。それと、彼女の存在で、 士官たちが…」{n}彼女は咳払いをした。{/n}「レディ・カシアは、何か大切なことをお話ししたいのではないでしょうか。彼女の不安が周囲の人々に広がっています」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan..." {n}Vigdis'in voks efektli sesi, eskisinden de mekanik ve yabancı geliyor.{/n} "Leydi Rotacı... Nöbet döngüsünün yarısından beri sizi köprüde bekliyor. Malum... Kendisinin varlığı, subaylarımızı... " {n}Boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Öyle sanıyorum ki Leydi Cassia'nın sizinle konuşmak istediği çok mühim bir mesela var. Bu rahatsız hâli, çevresindekileri de etkiliyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Vigdis's vox-distorted voice sounds even more mechanical and detached than normal.{/n} "The Lady Navigator... has been waiting for you on the bridge for half a watch cycle now. You see, because of her presence, the officers..." {n}She clears her throat.{/n} "I believe Lady Cassia wishes to speak about something very important. Her unease is spreading to those around her."
